t:
My dead family knocks on my window every night asking me to come out and join them.




It's been a month since Earth was destroyed, and with each passing day in this space station, I think I'm going insane.
c:
Not to mention, the crack that's been developing in the bay window.



#family #death #window #knock #ghost #destroyed #spaceship #scifi





The Martian and the Earth being destroyed in 2020.
